short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Just a couple of hairy interns trying to bribe their boss with a narcissistic chrome extension - Enjoy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace the word 'Legend' with 'Legend (Arjun Singh)'
+ so much more!

It isn't easy working in an industry full of bum'oles... 
Only joking - it's great... 
way better than ass holes - yuck!
And every so often (as interns)
You reaallllyyy have to go above and beyond 
to keep those bum'oles super-squeaky clean.

'Cus nobody likes a dirty bum'ole...
This bribes for you Arj... You Legend! (Arjun Singh)

Try to find what other words we've sneakily swapped...
